description: The classic smoke-and-scan combo. Smoke obscures enemy vision while Bloodhound scans reveal their positions.
tips: Bangalore smokes the enemy position, Bloodhound ults or scans to give the team high-fidelity info through the smoke.

description: Horizon's Black Hole pulls enemies in, making them easy targets for Fuse's Motherlode and clusters.
tips: Wait for Newt to settle before launching the Motherlode to center-lock the squad.

description: Using Gibraltar's Bubble to provide cover during the 3s spin-up of Valkyrie's Skyward Dive.
tips: Place the bubble, immediately start the dive from the center. Protects vs snipers during launch.

description: The ultimate defensive pairing. Wattson handles ordinance and shield regen, while Caustic denies entry with slow and damage.
tips: Place fences slightly behind gas traps to catch enemies who push through the blur.

description: Smoke can hinder high-ground snipers on your own team if placed poorly, though Digital Threat scopes negate this.
tips: Communicate smoke usage. Don't smoke enemies your sniper is actively suppressed.

description: Using Octane's Jump Pad in shadow form allows for silent, rapid, and vertical aggressive pushes.
tips: Pop shadows, take the pad immediately. If sent back, you're safe at the pad origin.

description: Crypto EMPs to break traps/shields, then Ash instantly portals the team onto the stunned enemies.
tips: Time the portal to open exactly as the EMP detonates.

description: Catalyst reinforces doors/walls while Seer gathers intel. Stronger in theory than practice due to Seer nerfs.
tips: Hold a reinforced door, let Seer scan for exact positioning before opening for a peek.

description: Smoke + Decoys creates immense visual clutter. Highly effective in Pubs, unreliable in high-tier Ranked.
tips: Pop ult inside smoke for maximum confusion against uncoordinated teams.

description: Redundant rotational tools. While not bad, it sacrifices utility for excessive movement.
tips: Use Portal for micro-rotations (safe crossing) and Zipline for macro (long distance).

description: The ultimate anti-cover duo. Maggie drills through walls while Fuse clusters the edges.
tips: Use Riot Drill to force them out of cover, then Knuckle Cluster where they run.

description: Newcastle's Castle Wall plus Wattson's Pylon creates an unbreakable position in open ground.
tips: Cast Castle Wall first, then drop Pylon behind it to stop grenade spam.

description: Revenant uses Forged Shadows for 75 HP, Conduit adds temp shields on top. Creates a 300+ HP tank.
tips: Conduit should tactical only after Revenant has engaged and taken initial damage/shadow damage.

description: Black Hole pulls enemies to the center; Gas Grenade blankets that exact spot.
tips: Horizon initiates. Caustic throws ult 1 second after Black Hole lands.

description: Vantage's Sniper's Mark gets boosted by Amped Cover. Massive damage per shot.
tips: Setup Amped Cover on high ground. Vantage marks targets for huge team damage bonus.

description: Ballistic's Tempest (speed boost) + Maggie's Wrecking Ball pads. Fun 'Speed Demon' playstyle but lacks defense.
tips: Pop Tempest and Wrecking Ball simultaneously for maximum rush speed in aggressive pushes.

description: Gibraltar's Dome Shield provides instant cover while Wattson sets up fences and pylon for sustained defense.
tips: Use Gibraltar's dome to buy time for Wattson to deploy full defensive setup. Dome + Pylon blocks all incoming damage.

description: Rampart's Amped Cover pairs perfectly with Wattson's fences for an impenetrable defensive position.
tips: Place Amped Walls facing outward with fences behind them. Pylon protects walls from grenade spam. Sheila + fences = death trap.

description: Catalyst's ferrofluid walls and reinforced doors synergize with Wattson's fences for layered building defense.
tips: Reinforce doors with Catalyst, fence behind them. Ferrofluid slows, then fences punish. Double the delay = easy kills.

description: Bangalore's smoke provides cover for Wattson to setup defenses uncontested in vulnerable positions.
tips: Smoke the area before setting up in open zones. Gives Wattson time to build fences without being sniped.

description: Pathfinder's ziplines enable early rotation to high ground, where Wattson can setup dominant defensive positions.
tips: Zipline to high ground early, fence all stairs and access points. Pylon on top = unbreakable high ground hold.

description: Valkyrie enables early rotation to ring before chaos, letting Wattson claim and fortify prime positions first.
tips: Skyward Dive into final zones early. Setup complete defense before other teams arrive. First in = best position.

description: Crypto's EMP destroys all Wattson fences and pylon instantly, completely disabling her defensive setup.
tips: As Crypto: EMP then push immediately. As Wattson: spread fences wide so drone can't get all at once, or shoot the drone.

description: Fuse's grenade spam tests Wattson's pylon, but pylon completely negates his ordnance advantage if active.
tips: As Fuse: wait for pylon to expire or destroy it first. As Wattson: keep pylon up during Fuse fights, makes him useless.

description: Mad Maggie's Riot Drill bypasses Wattson's fences by drilling through walls, forcing repositioning.
tips: As Maggie: drill corners where Wattson likely holds. As Wattson: maintain multiple fence layers so one drill doesn't collapse defense.

description: Horizon's Gravity Lift allows teams to bypass Wattson's ground-level fence defenses with vertical plays.
tips: As Horizon: lift over fences to high ground. As Wattson: fence vertical choke points and watch for lifts, communicate to team.
